trial.brief_title: A Placebo-controlled Safety and Tolerability Study of Intravenous (IV) and Subcutaneous (SC) AZD1163 in Healthy Volunteers
trial.official_title: A Phase I, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Immunogenicity of AZD1163 Administered as Single and Multiple Ascending Doses in Healthy Volunteers
